articles.description: The site is a specially protected "character building"
articles.content:
The new face mask on Banksy's famous Girl with a Pierced Eardrum graffiti seems set to stay.
The Bristolian guerilla artist's parody of Johannes Vermeer's Girl with a Pearl Earring painting first appeared on the side of an Albion Docks building at Bristol Ha… [+1776 chars]

articles.title: Prince Charles and Camilla clapping for carers might be the most awkward thing you'll see today - indy100
articles.content:

Music fans won't need reminding there are no live gigs happening at the moment.

articles.title: Taylor Swift disowns new live album, calling it 'shameless greed' - The Guardian
articles.description: Singer complains of ‘tasteless’ release amid coronavirus crisis by former label Big Machine, owned by frequent adversary Scooter Braun

articles.title: How the Queen comes into her own during a crisis - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Why do we turn to the Queen during crises – and how does she know instinctively what to say? In the week she turns 94, Harry Mount reports
articles.content: After thanking NHS workers, she turned to the majority of us, trapped at home, and subtly backed the Governments message that we should stay there. By thanking us for staying at home unlike the Governments irritating Americanism, asking us to stay home she ev… [+2382 chars]
